original_title: Salif Keita: Destiny of a Noble Outcast
overview: A child with albinism is often regarded in traditional societies as a curse on their family. Salif Keita, born from a noble lineage of Mali, lived in exclusion during his childhood. It is music that saved him. This film portrays Salif Keita, the man and musician. We follow him with his family, in the places of his childhood and during his concerts in Mali and in France.
title: Salif Keita: Destiny of a Noble Outcast
